ISSUE.TITLE: Raw data goes unused when sent to an endpoint.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In class-wp-json-server.php, when dispatching callbacks if an endpoint expects raw data that data will end up going unused breaking the endpoint: ``` php elseif ( $supported & self::ACCEPT_RAW ) { $data = $this->get_raw_data(); } ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #111 from SparkartGroupInc/add-taxonomy-term-descriptions Add descriptions to taxonomy term data

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #155 from WP-API/handle-raw-data Ensure we handle raw data passed to the API. Fixes #91.
Merge pull request #155 from WP-API/handle-raw-data Ensure we handle raw data passed to the API. Fixes #91.
